1.0.1.name: wordpress/go-contact
1.0.1.description:
Go-Contact is powerful plugin because it provides the admin to execute Javascript and PHP code when the form is submitted by the user.

Also a facility to auto download a file when the user have submitted the form, all you have to do is provide the url of the file

Note: Adding any javascript or php code which has bugs in it, will affect the working of the plugin. So use it carefully.
